label: def-cloning-score-function
name: Cloning Score Function
statement: The **Cloning Score Function**, $S: \mathbb{R}_{\ge 0} \times \mathbb{R}_{\ge 0} \to \mathbb{R}$, takes the fitness potential of a companion walker ($v_c$) and a primary walker ($v_i$) and computes a raw score.
description: This function computes a raw, unnormalized score that quantifies the relative fitness advantage of a companion walker over a primary walker. The score is regularized by a small constant epsilon in the denominator to prevent division by zero.

relations.description: The score is the difference in fitness potentials, normalized by the primary walker's fitness potential (plus a regularizer).
